TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Sʉhlʉnganʉ, title = Sʉhlʉnganʉ, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sʉhlʉnganʉ} }

S.FORM: alang Sʉhlʉnganʉ/Sulungan ga niya mki sku Takaw Si atu Toweng Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 41 buwan, 108 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 88% kyan ku 95 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 12% kyan ku 13 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 69%, Rukay 3%, Cou 7%, Paywan 1%, Hla'aluwa 6%, Setik 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga Rʉhlʉcʉ. tay mkyahu' na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga Dai-ni. tay 'zil na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga Tamahu. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Sʉhlʉnganʉ/Solongan ga niya mki sko Takaw Si ato Toweng Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 41 bowan, 108 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 88% kyan ko 95 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 12% kyan ko 13 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 69%, Rokay 3%, Coo 7%, Paywan 1%, Hla'alowa 6%, Setik 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga Rʉhlʉcʉ. tay mkyaho' na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga Dai-ni. tay 'zil na Sʉhlʉnganʉ hya' ga Tamaho. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
